title: Our Blog
subtitle: Latest News and Updates
description: Stay informed with our latest articles, company news, and business insights.

posts.title: Gutter Share Company: A Journey of Growth Since 2005
posts.excerpt: Discover the inspiring story of Gutter Share Company, established in 2005, and how we've grown to become a trusted name in Addis Ababa's business community.
posts.content: Gutter Share Company was established on April 11, 2005, in accordance with the Commercial Law of Ethiopia. From our humble beginnings, we have grown into a prominent business organization serving the Addis Ababa community. Our journey began with a vision to create a collective workplace through shareholder contributions, leading to the construction of the iconic Gutter Building in 2014. Located strategically near Piassa, the heart of Addis Ababa, our building has become a landmark in the Northwest exit area, just 300 meters from Ras Desta Hospital. Over the years, we have expanded our services to include shop and office rentals, hall and décor services, import-export trade, and catering services, making us a comprehensive business solution provider.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: Why Our Location in Piassa Makes Us the Perfect Choice
posts.excerpt: Learn about the strategic advantages of our prime location near Piassa and how it benefits our clients and partners.
posts.content: Our location in Arada Sub-City, Woreda 4, near Piassa offers unparalleled advantages for businesses and event organizers. Piassa is the commercial heart of Addis Ababa, making our building easily accessible to clients from all parts of the city. The proximity to major landmarks like Ras Desta Hospital and the main road connecting Piassa to Wingate ensures excellent visibility and foot traffic. Whether you're looking for office space, shop rentals, or event venues, our strategic location provides the perfect setting for your business needs. The multi-purpose hall we've established within the building offers comprehensive services, making it an ideal choice for conferences, weddings, corporate events, and social gatherings.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: Comprehensive Business Services: What We Offer
posts.excerpt: Explore the wide range of services provided by Gutter Share Company, from rentals to import-export and catering.
posts.content: At Gutter Share Company, we pride ourselves on offering a comprehensive suite of services to meet diverse business needs. Our shop and office rental services provide flexible, well-maintained spaces in a prime location. Our multi-purpose hall and décor services are perfect for events of all sizes, from intimate gatherings to large corporate functions. Our import-export trade division specializes in medication and medical supplies, construction materials, and other essential goods, facilitating international business connections. Additionally, our professional catering service ensures that your events are memorable with delicious, high-quality food. Each service is designed with our clients' success in mind, backed by years of experience and a commitment to excellence.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: The Gutter Building: A Milestone Achievement Completed in 2014
posts.excerpt: Celebrating the successful completion of the Gutter Building and its impact on the local business community.
posts.content: The completion of the Gutter Building in 2014 marked a significant milestone in our company's history. This modern, well-designed structure represents the collective vision and investment of our shareholders. The building features state-of-the-art facilities, including spacious offices, retail shops, and a versatile multi-purpose hall. Its strategic location and modern amenities have made it a preferred choice for businesses and event organizers. The building's design emphasizes functionality, accessibility, and aesthetic appeal, creating an environment that fosters business growth and success. Today, the Gutter Building stands as a testament to our commitment to excellence and our role in supporting Addis Ababa's business ecosystem.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: Navigating Import-Export Trade: Our Expertise in Medical and Construction Supplies
posts.excerpt: Learn about our import-export trade services and how we facilitate international business in medical supplies and construction materials.
posts.content: Our import-export trade division has established strong partnerships with international suppliers and distributors. We specialize in importing high-quality medication and medical supplies, ensuring healthcare facilities have access to essential products. Our construction materials division provides builders and contractors with reliable access to quality materials, supporting Ethiopia's growing construction industry. With years of experience in international trade, we understand the complexities of customs, logistics, and regulatory compliance. Our team works diligently to ensure smooth transactions, timely deliveries, and competitive pricing. Whether you're a healthcare provider, construction company, or business looking to import quality products, we have the expertise and network to meet your needs.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: Making Your Events Memorable: Hall Rental and Catering Services
posts.excerpt: Discover how our multi-purpose hall and professional catering services can make your next event a success.
posts.content: Planning an event? Our multi-purpose hall offers a versatile space that can be customized for weddings, corporate conferences, seminars, social gatherings, and more. Located in the heart of Addis Ababa, our hall provides easy access for guests and ample parking facilities. We offer comprehensive décor services to transform the space according to your vision and theme. Our professional catering service complements your event with delicious, freshly prepared meals that cater to various dietary preferences. Our experienced event coordination team works closely with you to ensure every detail is perfect, from setup to cleanup. With years of experience hosting successful events, we understand what it takes to create memorable experiences for you and your guests.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: Prime Office and Shop Spaces: Why Choose Gutter Building
posts.excerpt: Explore the benefits of renting office or shop space in our strategically located Gutter Building.
posts.content: Finding the right location for your business is crucial for success. Our Gutter Building offers prime office and shop spaces in one of Addis Ababa's most accessible and vibrant areas. Our rental spaces are designed to accommodate various business needs, from small startups to established enterprises. Each space features modern amenities, reliable utilities, and professional maintenance services. The building's strategic location near Piassa ensures high visibility and foot traffic, making it ideal for retail businesses. For office tenants, the professional environment and excellent connectivity provide the perfect setting for productivity and growth. Our flexible lease terms and competitive rates make it easy for businesses to establish themselves in this prime location. Contact us today to learn more about available spaces and how we can support your business journey.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company

posts.title: Building Community: Our Commitment to Addis Ababa
posts.excerpt: Learn about how Gutter Share Company contributes to the local community and supports economic growth.
posts.content: As a business organization established in Ethiopia, we recognize our responsibility to contribute positively to the local community. Through our various services, we create employment opportunities, support local businesses, and provide essential services that drive economic activity. Our import-export trade brings quality products to the market, supporting healthcare and construction sectors. Our rental services provide affordable spaces for entrepreneurs and businesses to grow. Our event facilities bring people together, fostering social connections and cultural exchange. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of service quality, ethical business practices, and community engagement. As we continue to grow, our dedication to supporting Addis Ababa's development remains at the core of everything we do.
posts.author: Gutter Share Company
